name: autoclik
description: Automation platform with Ansible AWX integration for executing runbooks and managing IT automation workflows

scripts.db:reset: node scripts/reset-database.js && npx prisma db push --skip-generate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.db:reset:win: node scripts/reset-database.js && npx prisma db push --skip-generate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.setup: npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run db:reset
scripts.setup:win: npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run db:reset:win

author: Shinish Sasidharan
